import { Button } from "@/registry/default/ui/button";
import {
  Dialog,
  DialogClose,
  DialogContent,
  DialogDescription,
  DialogFooter,
  DialogHeader,
  DialogTitle,
  DialogTrigger,
} from "@/registry/default/ui/dialog";

export default function DialogCustomCloseButton() {
  return (
    <Dialog>
      <DialogTrigger render={<Button variant="outline">Open dialog</Button>} />
      <DialogContent>
        <DialogHeader>
          <DialogTitle>Confirm Your Action</DialogTitle>
          <DialogDescription>
            This operation will update your settings and may affect your current
            configuration. Please confirm if you wish to proceed.
          </DialogDescription>
        </DialogHeader>
        <DialogFooter>
          <DialogClose render={<Button variant="outline">Cancel</Button>} />
          <Button variant="default">Confirm</Button>
        </DialogFooter>
      </DialogContent>
    </Dialog>
  );
}
